1030000.name: Neko Neko Rampage
1030000.description:
Neko Neko Rampage is a chaotic co-op action game where you and up to three friends take control of rolling cats. Team up, cause mayhem, and smash everything in sight as you race to rack up the most destruction before time runs out. 

Mischief and mayhem driven by playful physics

Follow Nico and his friends in an adventure to make cats the supreme race on planet Earth, as they did in the past! For that, you and your friends will help them find the hidden "Golden Yarns" in various environments. Starting from the grandma's house, the cats will visit a supermarket, a museum, a shopping center, a research lab... and even another dimension!

 

Designed for short play bursts, perfect when you just want to knock things over and laugh

In Neko Neko Rampage, objects can have different elements that interact with each other in various ways: Fire, Water, Electricity, and Explosives. Electricity is carried over by water, water puts down fire, fire creates explosions... and you have to be careful around them, knowing when to step back, or to use them to your advantage!

What Neko Neko Rampage offers:

  • 2-3 hours of play time

  • Multiplayer co-op! (up to 4 cats)

  • Messy, physical comedy in destructible rooms

  • Try to find the hidden golden yarns!

  • Tanukis and cats!

What Neko Neko Rampage does NOT offer:

  • Hardcore strategy

  • Tons of missions

  • New levels and characters after release

  • DLCs and MTX

A word from the team:

Neko Neko Rampage is just the beginning of a wild world of rolling cats and pure chaos. We made this game to bring you fun and plenty of laughs with your friends. So jump in, explore, and see what surprises we've tucked away for you!

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
